name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior Founding Engineer with 13+ years of software engineering experience, specializing in **microservices**, **distributed systems**, and **cloud** technologies. Proficient in **AWS** and **Kubernetes** for deploying and managing scalable applications. Strong expertise in **Java**, along with hands-on knowledge of **data structures** and **algorithms** to develop high-performance solutions.
